messages.title: Labour's plan to rebuild Britain's schools
messages.content: Cap the cost of school uniforms, Free school meals for all primary school children, Extend mental health counselling to all schools, Replace Universal Credit with a system that's fair for families, Proper support for children with special educational needs and disabilities (SEND)

messages.title: TORY CUTS TO PONTEFRACT SCHOOLS
messages.content: Pontefract schools are losing £6.1 million. After 10 years of Tory austerity Pontefract schools can't afford more cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's plan includes capping the cost of school uniforms, providing free school meals for all primary school children, extending mental health counselling to all schools, replacing Universal Credit with a fair system for families, and giving proper support for children with special educational needs and disabilities (SEND).

issues.education: Labour promises to cap the cost of school uniforms, provide free school meals for all primary school children, extend mental health counselling to all schools, replace Universal Credit with a system that's fair for families, and support for children with special educational needs and disabilities (SEND). Pontefract schools are losing £6.1 million due to Tory cuts.
issues.socialWelfare: Replace Universal Credit with a system that's fair for families.

contactInformation.address: Normanton, Pontefract and Castleford Labour Party at 1 York Street, Castleford, WF10 1RB, Albert Street, Featherstone, Pontefract, WF7 5EX

quotes.text: After 10 years of Tory austerity Pontefract schools can't afford more cuts.

images.caption: Labour's plan to rebuild Britain's schools
